about_the_game:
Heyho, you funky sexy slime adventurer!

Welcome to a mindbending erotic drag 'n drop puzzle adventure where you play three versions of yourself at the same time! Multi-dimensional, booby, brainy goodness for adults!


Brave slime Lim-Lim faces countless sexy adventures in mysterious fantasy worlds!
His adventures have been recorded in the Smutty Scrolls... especially the lewd endings!

Wishlist Smutty Scrolls now! You sexy little slime, you... 🍆

Meet your fantasy dates

All girls are in love with Lim-Lim! What, didn't you know that girls love slimes?
Princesses, witches, vampires, dragon girls and more are waiting for you!

Stay Alive

There are so many ways to die... Get eaten, roasted, sliced, eaten, burnt, squashed, and eaten!
Try to find them all!

Discover myriads of endings

The flow of time is uncertain, and every story may have several possible endings.
Unlock them all by changing the flow of your adventure on the fly!

Play in different ways

Some adventurers like a challenge, while some like to take it easy. Find your favorite game mode amongst all Smutty Scrolls.
Is it Quest mode? Adventure Mode? Orgy mode?
No matter which one you choose, all of them have lewd endings ;)



Wishlist Smutty Scrolls now and start your sexy, slimey, seducing adventure! 💖

Stay funky,
your Team Tailnut devs Dezue & OniGiri

More Games

Follow us on our Steam Developer page!

content_descriptors.notes:
Smutty Scrolls contains adult themes and content that is only suitable for certain ages. Characters are shown in frisky situations and there's frequent adult humor abound.

All depicted individuals are adults over the age of 21.

name: Smutty Scrolls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 4th Gen or similiar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 Display recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An erotic drag 'n drop puzzle adventure where you play three versions of yourself - at the same time! You're a sexy slime hero... Change the outcome of your story in real time! Explore the Smutty Scrolls, find legendary items and stay alive to date and pleasure all the girls! ❤️
supported_languages: English, Russian, German, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, French, Italian
